channel.title: How do I change the drop rate
channel.description: How do I change the drop rate of an item from a monster? For example I want to change the drop rate of a Crystal Key dropping from jad to 20%, How would I do it?

item.title: How do I change the drop rate
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

IMO dodian sucks (dont know why, i just think that)

if you wanted to edit your drop rate, go into npchandler.java, search for this:

public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID)

scroll down just a little ways and you’ll see some lines that look kind of like this

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomKBD(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);

this refers to the drops from the king black drag, so to change you would to go item2.java

[code]public static int KBD[] = {4734,1575,3140,1575,1575,4119,4119,4119,4119,4119,2503,2503,2503,2503,2503,2503,2503,2503,2503,1249,1846,1846,1846,4158,4158,4158,4158,4158,2476,2476,2476,2476,2476,2476,2476,2476,2476,2476,2476,2476,2476,2476,2476,2476,2476,2476,2476,1263,1580,5013,5013,5013,1611,1611,1611,1611,1611,1611,1611,1611,1611,1611,1611,1611,2599,2599,2599,2599,2599,2599,4170,4170,4170,1641,1641,1641,1641,1641,1641,1641,1641,1641,1641,1641,1641,1641,1641,1641,1641,1641,1641,1641,1641,1641,1641,6922,6924,6912,6914,6910,6735,6731,6737,4087,3140,5698,7461,6916,6918,6920,6922,6924,6912,6914,6910,6735,6731,6737,4087,3140,5698,7461,6916,6918,6920,6922,6924,6912,6914,6910,6735,6731,6737,4087,3140,3105,4151,7158,5698,3105,3105,4151};

public static int randomKBD()
{
	return KBD[(int)(Math.random()*KBD.length)];
}

[/code]

just add more items to that line if you want to make them more common, take out to be more rare.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the drop rate
